DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this trial is to establish bioequivalence of two FDC tablets and the single tablets when administered together after a high fat high caloric meal.
DOC.brief_title: Demonstration of Bioequivalence of Empagliflozin and Metformin Given in One Tablet Compared to the Intake of Single Tablets
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
